title: Sona skin addon idea
body:
Hey fellow summoners , :)

I dont know if it has been discussed b4 ( couldnt find anything on search) but i think it would be awesome if riot added songs like Dj sona played throughout the game in every sona skin according to the style of the skin. For example, pentakill sona could play all game long the songs from the pentakill album or instrumentals of the songs like dj Sona does, arcade sona could play arcade sound songs and etc. Since Sona is a character that doesnt speak much, this add on would be awesome.  Already contacted riot and they lliked the idea and also said to post it here . What do you guys think?

replies.body: me too. lets hope they see it :)
